description:
Extra-thick cushioning in the heels and toes for travel in challanging terrain. Flat knit feet and heavy-duty yarns on the legs provide comfort and protection even in low-volume mountaineering boots.

  • Responsibly-sourced Merino and recycled nylon help reduce your environmental footprint
  • High-density cushion in heel and toe provide protection and comfort in high-impact areas
  • Elasticized arch band keeps sock in place
  • Flat knit toe seams for high burst strength
name: Smartwool Classic Mountaineer Maximum Cushion Crew Socks - Unisex
